entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incompatible with .NET Framework 4.8.1 runtime. Loading the wrong DLL. #76518
  • Certain build configurations are "less efficient" #76516
  • R2R image of SPC has many costly ValueTuple methods #76513
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure(PID 6732 [0x00001a4c], Thread: 7104 [0x1bc0]): Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 9 lock CrstCodeVersioning because you already holding level 5 lock CrstCOMWrapperCache #76512
  • Assertion failed '!op1->isUsedFromMemory()' #76511
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting Sliding vs Fix windows implementation #76510
  • Assertion failed '!"Qmarks beyond morph disallowed."' #76509
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\jit64\\opt\\lur\\lur_02\\lur_02.cmd #76507
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: access violation in cpblk tests #76506
    8.0.0
  • SIMD store coalescing and atomicity guarantees #76503
  • Utilizing flags set by various instructions, not just `cmp` and `test`. #76502
  • [NativeAOT] ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_ForceContentionWithToArray fails intermittently on osx-arm64 #76501
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Consider removing security object info from GCInfo #76482
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #76347
    8.0.0
  • Common args in src/tests/build.sh are passed to MSBuild #76508
  • [NativeAOT] System.Security.Tests failing on macOS with link errors #76498
  • Intermittent crash in DynamicGenerics test on OSX x64 #73299
    8.0.0
  • AV under coreclr!GlobalStringLiteralMap::AddStringLiteral #76494
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixing where `ClearContained` is called for certain Arm64 cast ops #76517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete `RSA.EncryptValue` and `RSA.DecryptValue` #76514
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • Delete security object from GCInfo encoder/decoder #76487
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: A small CQ improvement for Equals/StartsWith unrolling #76439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Process primitives in local morph #76155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix native AOT with CryptoKit #76499
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable DynamicGenerics test on OSX #76489
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert change in AddInternedString #76496
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • Ensure NI_Vector256_GetLower has the right simdSize and improve codegen slightly #76456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76459
    area-Meta
  • Lower `GetLower` nodes formed from `GetElement(0)` #76492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #76497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce OrderBy overheads for default comparer #76418
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: support FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GeneratePackageOnBuild Not Including Assets added to project by previous build step. #28297
  • Support for hot restart #28296

PullRequests

Created

  • [dotnet-new] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #28295

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inexplicable CS8978 'T' cannot be made nullable #64431
  • Source generator MissingMethodException GeneratorExecutionContext AdditionalFiles #64430

Closed

  • 'Invert if' mishandles lifted relational operators #63311
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #64426
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #64425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix 'invert if' mishandling of lifted nullable operators #64432
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64434
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File Operation in Ubuntu 22.04 #44314
  • Considerable overhead in middleware pipeline #44311

Closed

  • Input tag with type of "range" @bind not working properly. Blazor WebAssembly #43004
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize some string.Substring usages #44313
    community-contribution
  • Use string.StartsWith(char) and string.EndsWith(char) where applicable #44310
    Perf, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2009614 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Route tooling: Add Minimal API or MVC parameter fixer #44276
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView not displaying until I swipe the screen #10453
  • Toolbar items are affected from previous page on Android #10452
  • [Bug] Can't get Windows Location Permission / Permissions.RequestAsync method doesn't work #10451
  • 'dotnet cake --target=VS' for the MAUI repo hangs on Windows #10450
  • FilePicker Android mime-type for gpx files not working #10449
  • Unable to build .NET MAUI application after upgrade to Visual Studio 17.3.5 #10448
  • Incorrect instruction how to get version in bug report #10447

Closed

  • iOS Simulators list not populated #10346
  • Mac Connection: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.DotNet.Configurer, #10373

PullRequests

Updated

  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10437
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ExecuteUpdate` with `Dictionary<string, object?>` update condition #29247

PullRequests
